cause.description:
LIGHT IT UP AND CELEBRATE FOR JOINING THE EUPHORIA AWARENESS CAMPAIGN FOR MARIJUANA. THE ONE AND ONLY FACEBOOK CAUSE WORTH FIGHTING FOR.
1. Legalize Marijuana at Once !!
2. Study Marijuana for Medicinal Purposes
3. Marijuana is NOT a Drug, It Is Natural
cause.mission: Legalize marijuana for personal use and medicinal purposes
cause.name: Euphoria and Awareness Campaign for Marijuana
